alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:36PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...An isolated thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado through 415 PM MDT... At 334 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an isolated thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Cheyenne Wells, moving east at 5 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. Cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Cloud to ground lightning could start wildfires. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne Wells. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 136 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
